original_body_lines: Colombo, May 1 (Daily Mirror) - Resulting from the fuel price revision from last night, the cement manufacturing companies have decided to reduce the retail price of a 50 kg bag of cement.
Accordingly, the price of a 50 kg bag of cement has been reduced by Rs. 50.
Following the price revision, the new retail price of a 50 kg bag of cement will be Rs. 2,400, the companies said.
